name: Abyss Actor - Twinkle Littlestar
text: Cannot be destroyed by battle during your turn. This card can make a second and third attack on monsters during each Battle Phase.
pendulum_text: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Abyss Actor" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Abyss Actor" monster you control; this turn, it can make a second and third attack on monsters during each Battle Phase, also other monsters you control cannot attack (even if this card leaves the field).
